content:
Okay, I found this answer in reddit to a different question, through which I changed the default sort order to sort to decreasing mail size, which helped.

Still looking for a easier solution than having to go to settings > config editor > advanced preferences and change few parameters every time i need to change how the mail is being sorted.
creator: vvishalchandrahaas

content:
niekengelhart zei
I can not send emails anymore from my gmail account. SMTP authentication faild. Tried to reset password, did not succees (it succeeded on my mobile phone and in the browser). Updated Thunderbird (see image), however nothing seems to work :-( IMAP does work, so fortunatly I can receive answers to solve this problem ! Does anyone has a tip ??

PS. OAuth in SMTP settings does not worh either :(
creator: niekengelhart

content: You must click the 'allow' button. This is a security issue from Google, not Thunderbird. Google is about to place a unique password in your thunderbird and wants your assurance that it is okay to do.
creator: davidsk
